system.description: You start violence with an animated corpse choked with flowers. When you start your riff, the corpse can move 5 squares. The corpse is Height 1 and is an object, but it cannot die. It's already dead. All enemies in burst 2 of the corpse suffer -1 to all defenses.
system.flavor: You have captured wandering souls that wish to offer their ghostly consciousnesses for a virtuous cause. You know each of their names.
